Name: Mini Racing World
About the game: Arcade racing game Mini Racing World is a low poly arcade racing game with a career, car tuning and a open world map to explore! It has a simple and immediate driving model, but difficult to master. 18 different vehicles You can buy new cars with the credits you gain by playing the events. Every car has a different driving style and different components to customize it. You can also unlock some components by completing certain events. Car customization Modify your cars by changing color, exhaust, spoilers and other aesthetic components. Improve the perfomance of your vehicle to be able to proceed during the career. Career subdivided in seasons and a mini open world to explore Become the Mini Racing World champion by winning seasons and special races. Explore a diverse mini open world to access the events and the garage. Low poly colorful graphics 3D low poly graphics with colorful and stylized environment and cars. Vehicles out of proportion for maximum cuteness.
